title: eNNi eNNi tudi
sahitya:
eNNi eNNi tudi paNNi gati peruvOm SaNmukha aNNalin ponnaDi tannai tAm


anupallavi

  viNNulagattOrum maNNulagattOrum paNNina perum tavam palittE udittOnai


caraNam    sharavaNap-poighaiyil aruvanAip-pirandu arumukhattODu pinnE oruvanAi sirandOnai
dharaNiyOrukk-aruLa talam pala tigazhvOnai karuNaikkaDal anaiya tiru kATSi taruvOnai
